name: Home Adrift
description:
A small game about being a guy on a boat which is his home who dives for treasure. This was a simple proof of concept game made in a weekend to prototype a game with the ideas of looking for treasure.

How to play:

Collect treasure at the bottom of the ocean floor but don't run out of breath!

Go above water to recover your O2, and return to the top of your boat to recover your HP. When you run out of O2 your HP starts depleting and if you get knocked unconscious you lose all of your treasure.

WASD/Left Joystick: Move

Space/A: Jump

Start: Pause Menu/View Treasure
